main event: On 22 September 1956, an observer reported seeing an object resembling a weather balloon, white in color, with no radar contact.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at GMT: 20/0107Z,The object was observed to be on course 270 degrees,The observer believed the object to possibly be an astro body or a balloon,The case was evaluated with multiple possibilities including insufficient data,There was no aircraft in the area during the observation.
sighted object: an object the size and shape of a weather balloon
